definition: oil/fat/grease/petroleum/to apply tung oil, paint or varnish/oily/greasy/glib/cunning

sentences.english: The same is not true for victims blacking out in warm-water swimming pools.
sentences.chinese: 同樣是不正確的黑色鞋油在溫水泳池出來的受害者。

sentences.english: He bought a tin of brown polish.
sentences.chinese: 他昨天買一聽褐色鞋油。

sentences.english: Use brown polish on these shoes.
sentences.chinese: 用棕色的鞋油擦這雙鞋。

sentences.english: When I bought the shoes I asked the salesman to throw in some shoe polish.
sentences.chinese: 我買這雙鞋時，要求售貨員額外贈送鞋油。
僕人給他的靴子擦黑鞋油。

sentences.english: The shoeshine of color close also can have similar action.
sentences.chinese: 顏色相近的鞋油也可以起到同樣的作用。

sentences.english: She clung to her husband, fighting the feeling of blacking out.
sentences.chinese: 她抓着她的丈夫，戰鬥的黑色鞋油出來的感覺。

sentences.english: What earn money truly is the product such as the patent shoeshine that promotes them.
sentences.chinese: 真正掙錢的是推銷它們的專利鞋油等產品。

sentences.english: They're done with blacking, I believe.
sentences.chinese: 他們做的黑色鞋油，我相信。

sentences.english: He had a job of pasting labels of blacking .
sentences.chinese: 他有一個粘貼標籤的黑色鞋油工作。
僕人給他的靴子擦黑鞋油。

sentences.english: Similar color shoe polish can also play the same role.
sentences.chinese: 顏色相近的鞋油也可以起到同樣的作用。

sentences.english: You just ran out of shoe shine just when you need it for a job interview. Not to worry.
sentences.chinese: 要去參加一次工作面試，鞋油用光了，不用擔心。
